text: Jane Danson (born Jane Elizabeth Dawson; 8 November 1978) is an English actress. She is best known for her portraying the role of Leanne Battersby in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street (1997–2000, 2004–present). Her other television credits include Children's Ward (1995–1997), The Grand (1997), Always and Everyone (2001–2002) and The Bill (2002–2003). For her role on Coronation Street, Danson won the 2011 British Soap Award for "Best Dramatic Performance". ==Other websites== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Jane Danson
